name: Catmaze
description: Catmaze is a fairy metroidvania inspired by Slavic myths. Age-old tales will come to life in the unforgettable adventure of Alesta, a sorceress whose courage guides her through mysterious paths and dark forests in search of the lost road to Navi, the world of the dead.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 处理器: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory 存储空间: 需要 350 MB 可用空间
